body_html:
I have ppc64le (Power8) architecture computer with NVIDIAP100 GPU's. In C/C++ scripts or other frameworks, I did not have any issue, but PyTorch gives following error when I tried to install via "python setup.py install":

Note: Except for magma-cuda (as it is not available in ppc64le), I installed other dependencies.

running install
running build_deps
-- The C compiler identification is GNU 5.4.0
-- The CXX compiler identification is GNU 5.4.0
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc -- works
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info
-- Checking if C linker supports --verbose
-- Checking if C linker supports --verbose - yes
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting C compile features
-- Detecting C compile features - done
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/c++
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/c++ -- works
-- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info
-- Checking if CXX linker supports --verbose
-- Checking if CXX linker supports --verbose - yes
-- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting CXX compile features
-- Detecting CXX compile features - done
/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc: 1: /usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc: Syntax error: "(" unexpected
CMake Error at /home/suemer/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA/FindCUDA.cmake:708 (string):
string sub-command REGEX, mode REPLACE needs at least 6 arguments total to
command.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
CMakeLists.txt:5 (FIND_PACKAGE)

CMake Error at /home/suemer/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA/FindCUDA.cmake:709 (string):
string sub-command REGEX, mode REPLACE needs at least 6 arguments total to
command.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
CMakeLists.txt:5 (FIND_PACKAGE)

CMake Error at /home/suemer/anaconda3/share/cmake-3.6/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:148 (message):
Could NOT find CUDA: Found unsuitable version ".", but required is at least
"7.0" (found /usr/local/cuda)
Call Stack (most recent call first):
/home/suemer/anaconda3/share/cmake-3.6/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:386 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
/home/suemer/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA/FindCUDA.cmake:1014 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
CMakeLists.txt:5 (FIND_PACKAGE)

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/suemer/pytorch/torch/lib/build/nccl/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".

I have ppc64le (Power8) architecture computer with NVIDIAP100 GPU's. In C/C++ scripts or other frameworks, I did not have any issue, but PyTorch gives following error when I tried to install via "python setup.py  install":
Note: Except for magma-cuda (as it is not available in ppc64le), I installed other dependencies.

body:
I have ppc64le (Power8) architecture computer with NVIDIAP100 GPU's. In C/C++ scripts or other frameworks, I did not have any issue, but PyTorch gives following error when I tried to install via "python setup.py  install":

Note: Except for magma-cuda (as it is not available in ppc64le), I installed other dependencies.

running install
running build_deps
-- The C compiler identification is GNU 5.4.0
-- The CXX compiler identification is GNU 5.4.0
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc -- works
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info
-- Checking if C linker supports --verbose
-- Checking if C linker supports --verbose - yes
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting C compile features
-- Detecting C compile features - done
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/c++
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/c++ -- works
-- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info
-- Checking if CXX linker supports --verbose
-- Checking if CXX linker supports --verbose - yes
-- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info - done
-- Detecting CXX compile features
-- Detecting CXX compile features - done
/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc: 1: /usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc: Syntax error: "(" unexpected
CMake Error at /home/suemer/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA/FindCUDA.cmake:708 (string):
  string sub-command REGEX, mode REPLACE needs at least 6 arguments total to
  command.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:5 (FIND_PACKAGE)


CMake Error at /home/suemer/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA/FindCUDA.cmake:709 (string):
  string sub-command REGEX, mode REPLACE needs at least 6 arguments total to
  command.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:5 (FIND_PACKAGE)


CMake Error at /home/suemer/anaconda3/share/cmake-3.6/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:148 (message):
  Could NOT find CUDA: Found unsuitable version ".", but required is at least
  "7.0" (found /usr/local/cuda)
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/suemer/anaconda3/share/cmake-3.6/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:386 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /home/suemer/pytorch/cmake/FindCUDA/FindCUDA.cmake:1014 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
  CMakeLists.txt:5 (FIND_PACKAGE)

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/suemer/pytorch/torch/lib/build/nccl/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
